Change.After: Umbral Dash's healing is no longer increased by 20/24/28/32/36% during World Ender

Change.Attribute: Bonus Movement Speed on Critical Strike:

Change.After: 144/216/288/360/432 (+135% AP) (Note: Including the damage upon rooting an enemy, this totals to 164/246/328/411/492 (+215% AP))

Teemo Q blind should now immediately apply to targets hit by the Q, preventing Teemo from taking damage from an auto attack after the blind has been applied. Blind duration should now also be consistent with the debuff duration above the target’s health bar.

Change.Attribute: Defiance Secondary Target Bonus Movement Speed Duration:

Change.Before: 5-15.2 (based on level) + 30% AP + 1-5% target max HP (based on level)
Change.After: 5 + 30% AP + 1-5% target max HP (based on level)
Ornn can now upgrade all (minus a few exceptions like Mejai's Soulstealer, Archangel's Staff, and similar items) Legendary items to Masterwork items.
Masterwork Items gain extra stats based on the stats the original Legendary item provides. (If an item gives AD and HP, the upgrade will give you more AD and HP etc.)

P.SpellName: Passive - Fury of the North, Frost Armor

Change.After: 6-48 (based on level) (+2% AP per 100 bonus health) (+4% of his bonus health)
30 (Note: Bonus movement speed during Final Hour will be unchanged at 90.)
Shaco’s Jack in the Boxes are no longer one-shot by Grubs.
Shaco’s clone now creates an orange poof when it snaps back to Shaco or teleports for any reason.
Shaco’s clone duration is now displayed on the HUD.
Shaco’s clone no longer loses its auto attack target when casting spells.

Change.After: 50% Attack Speed and 25% Attack Speed as Attack Damage and Ability Power
Viktor's Q empowered auto attack now applies to towers.
now matches Kog'Maw's auto attack frame time

Corki's recommended skill order for mid lane has been updated to now suggest maxing Q first.

Change.After: 30-60 based on level (+15% Bonus AD) (+10% AP)

Updated the tooltip and cooldown display to more accurately align with seed spawn times
Flame Spitter no longer prevents minions from dying to other minions if they would die to one more tick of Flame Spitter.
Flame Spitter now deals 1 bonus tick of damage (ability duration permitting) if it would kill a lane minion.
E now silences enemies in the area instantly rather than after a variable delay.

Change.After: 35 (+10 per 5 Chimes) (+40% AP) Bonus Magic Damage

Change.After: 15% per target (up to a maximum of 45%)

Change.After: 25%, halved to 12.5% for damage dealt by allies
Now uses both attack animations equally instead of 75/25%
Terrify is now blocked by Yasuo's Wind Wall, Braum's Unbreakable, and Samira's Blade Whirl.
Short-range casts now dash to within 150 units of his target

Change.Before: 22/37/52/67/82 (+30% AP) (+3% (+0.5% per Feast stack) of target's maximum health)
Change.After: 20/40/60/80/100 (+30% AP) (+3% (+0.5% per Feast stack) of target's maximum health)

Crits only increase Volibear’s attack damage instead of total ability damage
Top and mid lane recommended runes have been updated

Maiden no longer reduces Area of Effect damage by 50%.
Tooltip now clarifies that Maiden takes 70% less damage from lane minions.
Maiden's 1/2/3% maximum health damage no longer bypasses Evasion like Shen's W. (Note: Blind, Dodge, and Evasion all work appropriately against the rest of Maiden's attacks.)

Change.After: 100% for the first, reduced to 15% for successive champions
